column2: whereas the EC Treaty and in particular Article 272 thereof, and the Interinstitutional Agreement of 6 May 1999 and in particular points 27 and 30 thereof, contain provisions which confirm the powers and the procedures of the budgetary authority on the classification of expenditure and corresponding authority,
Approves the Joint Declaration annexed to this resolution;
Instructs its President to forward this resolution together with the Joint Declaration to the Council and the Commission.
